keyPolicies.policyDescription: Continue with the close integration of health and care services as well as pressing for more NHS dentists and better diagnostic services closer to home.
Ensure action is taken to cut harmful emissions and enhance nature.
Provide the vital industries the Government support they need to flourish while also providing environmental benefits and food security.
Offer a new fairer deal for small businesses, supporting them and promoting growth.
Continue to press for homes that locals can afford, get key workers and planners to ensure quality homes are built and empty buildings refurbished.
Work to ensure the extra Â£23.5m from Government allows passengers to get to and from work and take journeys that modern life determines at a price they can afford on our buses.

issues.environment: Ensure action is taken to cut harmful emissions and enhance nature.
issues.health: Continue with the close integration of health and care services, pressing for more NHS dentists and better diagnostic services closer to home.

housing.content: Continue to press for homes that locals can afford, get key workers and planners to ensure quality homes are built and empty buildings refurbished.
